Item.Title: Camera Interfaces (Basler, IDS...)
Item.Description: Future engineers in photonics have to develop softwares including industrial cameras. This link provides Python drivers and graphical elements (PyQt6) for Basler and IDS camera.

Item.Title: Aberrations Labwork GUI (Zygo)
Item.Description: GUI to control a Zygo interferometer and process images of interferences.
